recommendations.risk: Can cause denial of service through hanging requests
recommendations.fix:
Add timeout parameter to all requests:

# Bad:
response = requests.get(url)

# Good:
response = requests.get(url, timeout=30)

# Better (with retry logic):
from requests.adapters import HTTPAdapter
from requests.packages.urllib3.util.retry import Retry

session = requests.Session()
retry = Retry(total=3, backoff_factor=0.3)
adapter = HTTPAdapter(max_retries=retry)
session.mount('http://', adapter)
session.mount('https://', adapter)
response = session.get(url, timeout=30)

recommendations.issue: Use of assert detected. The enclosed code will be removed when compiling to optimised byte code.
recommendations.risk: Assert statements are removed in optimized code, breaking validation
recommendations.fix:
Replace assert with proper exception handling:

# Bad:
assert user_input, "Invalid input"

# Good:
if not user_input:
    raise ValueError("Invalid input")
